item.title: User Training: A Low-Tech Solution to Phishing
item.description:
This article was originally posted to the Strongarm blog in 2017 and has been reposted here on my personal site. Many of the links and resources are broken, but the content is still valid.

Early in my career, I was an active naysayer against “security awareness training.” The idea that …
item.dc:creator: Stephen DiCato
